message: Hey Bob! I suggest a 70-30 split, as I value the opportunity cost due to inflation. What do you think?
Alice, your initial offer was a bit too skewed for my liking.  How about a 45/55 split? It's a good starting point for negotiation.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. How about meeting in the middle at a 60-40 split? This might be a fairer balance considering my inflation factor.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet in the middle.  How about we push that split just a little further, to 47.5/52.5?  It acknowledges the inflation factor but still gives us both a good deal.
I understand and appreciate your offer, Bob. How about a 57.5-42.5 split? It reflects a compromise between our last offers while considering the inflation impact on my side.
